QueryResult.text: SELECT F.RESOURCE_ID RESOURCE_ID, RCF.OBS1_UNIT_ID OBS1_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS2_UNIT_ID OBS2_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS3_UNIT_ID OBS3_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS4_UNIT_ID OBS4_UNIT_ID, RCF.OBS5_UNIT_ID OBS5_UNIT_ID, F.FACT_DATE FACT_DATE, RCF.RESOURCE_CODE RESOURCE_CODE, RCF.LAST_NAME LAST_NAME, RCF.FIRST_NAME FIRST_NAME, RCF.ROLE_ID ROLE_ID, RCF.ROLE_NAME ROLE_NAME, RCF.RESOURCE_COMPANY_ID RESOURCE_COMPANY_ID, RCF.RESOURCE_COMPANY RESOURCE_COMPANY, RCF.EXTERNAL_OR_INTERNAL EXTERNAL_OR_INTERNAL, F.AVAILABLE_HOURS, F.ETC_HOURS, F.ACTUAL_HOURS, F.BASE_HOURS, F.ALLOCATED_HOURS, RCF.MANAGER_ID MANAGER_ID, RCF.MANAGER_LAST_NAME, RCF.MANAGER_FIRST_NAME, RCF.ENTITY ENTITY, RCF.ENTITY_NAME ENTITY_NAME, RCF.LOCATION LOCATION, RCF.LOCATION_NAME LOCATION_NAME, RCF.DEPARTMENT DEPARTMENT, RCF.DEPARTMENT_NAME DEPARTMENT_NAME, RCF.IS_ROLE IS_ROLE FROM NBI_R_FACTS F, NBI_RESOURCE_CURRENT_FACTS RCF WHERE F.RESOURCE_ID = RCF.RESOURCE_ID
